item.simplyboots.rocket_boots.tooltip: Allows limited flight and Elytra boosting.
item.simplyboots.spectre_boots.tooltip:
Allows faster movement, limited flight,
and Elytra boosting.
item.simplyboots.lightning_boots.tooltip:
Allows faster movement, limited flight
and Elytra boosting.
item.simplyboots.frostspark_boots.toolti:
Allows faster movement, limited flight,
Elytra boosting, and extra mobility on ice.
item.simplyboots.water_walking_boots.too: Provides the ability to walk on water.
item.simplyboots.obsidian_water_walking_:
Provides the ability to walk on water.
Grants fire resistance.
item.simplyboots.lava_charm.tooltip:
When held, grants fire resistance and
7 seconds of lava immunity.
item.simplyboots.lava_waders.tooltip:
Provides the ability to walk on water and lava.
Grants fire resistance and
7 seconds of lava immunity.
item.simplyboots.terraspark_boots.toolti:
